projects.title: The DIJ (React-Drone app)
projects.description: Built a scalable e-commerce application with React.js and Redux, using Firebase for backend services and user authentication. Implemented core e-commerce features like cart handling, search, filtering, and page routing. Emphasized component reusability and clean code structure.

projects.title: Admin Panel
projects.description: Created a feature-rich, fully responsive admin panel with Bootstrap and jQuery, enhancing usability and functionality for administrators.

projects.title: Nike-clone (MERN) Responsive
projects.description: Nike clone with Razorpay payments, email auth (Nodemailer), and image uploads via Multer. Built using React, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind, Node.js, Express, MongoDB. Deployed frontend on Vercel and backend on Render with responsive design and full UI replication.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A simple task management application with user authentication.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: A responsive blog website built using Bootstrap and jQuery, featuring a modern UI, smooth animations, and dynamic content handling.
